about_the_game:
"The Floor Is Lava" is a game made to be light, funny and fun to play with friends in multiplayer mode or even play story mode!

"The Floor is Lava" is a parkour and adventure game with mountains, rocks and even floating objects that defy the law of physics! But remember, if you fall in the lava. You'll have to do it all again!

"The Floor is Lava" is in addition to being a game that defies the laws of physics, it also defies other laws like the law of floating over some objects to make your game a little easier, because I did not want to speak anything but pretty hard!

"The Floor is Lava" is love, happiness and all that good! So please buy this game I never asked for anything! (I love you)

(This is the first Cat Launch Studio game, I hope you like it!)

"The Floor is Lava" is a parkour and adventure game with mountains, rocks and even floating objects that defy the law of physics! But remember, if you fall in the lava. You'll have to do it all again!

"The Floor is Lava" is in addition to being a game that defies the laws of physics, it also defies other laws like the law of floating over some objects to make your game a little easier, because I did not want to speak anything but pretty hard!

"The Floor is Lava" is love, happiness and all that good! So please buy this game I never asked for anything! (I love you)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3240 @ 3.60 GHz / AMD A4 7300 @ 3.80 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 710M / AMD HD 4870 1 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 @ 3.20 GHz / AMD FX 8320 @ 4.00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650ti 2 GB / AMD HD7870 2 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: The Floor is Lava

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3240 @ 3.60 GHz / AMD A4 7300 @ 3.80 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 710M / AMD HD 4870 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 @ 3.20 GHz / AMD FX 8320 @ 4.00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650ti 2 GB / AMD HD7870 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10
